description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for present-day (2015) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions with present day (2015) greenhouse gas concentrations and pre-industrial carbon monoxide (CO). Use specified atmospheric distributions of present day temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
keywords: RFMIP, Tier 2, PD GHG, present day greenhouse gas, PI CO, pre-industrial carbon monoxide, aerosol-free, clear sky, radiative transfer model
rationale: Clear sky calculations for a set of prescribed atmospehric conditions to identify the degree to which errors in radiative transfer contribute to diverstiy in estimates of instantaneous radiative forcing and how this error depends on the background state of the atmosphere and on the forcing itself.
